question: Mufti Sahab Asalamoalikum, Who are Ahle Hadiths and Shiya are They Kaafir?
answer:
QUESTION
Mufti Sahab As in hadith it is mentioned that one tack will go to Jannah if it is Ahle-Sunna (INSHA ALLA) so will be there anybody in Jannah from any other Tack?
ANSWER


Share:
The Hadith is clear that from the 73 difference sects, only one will be
successful and will go to Jannah. That is the Ahlus Sunnah Wal Jamaa' (those
that follow the laws of Allah according to the method shown by Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) and his illustrious Sahaaba).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
